subproject.description:
- Advanced process of restructuring of the MOLPSHRD and its constituent units; focusing on the development of job specification in the context of decentralization.  

- Strengthened capacity of Management Development Center (MDC) to address training needs for senior public servants given the ongoing administrative reform programmes particularly at the national level with relevance to decentralisation.

- Strengthened capacity of Sudan Academy for Administrative Sciences (SAAS) to address training needs arising out of ongoing administrative reform process, especially for decentralized and local governance

- Capacity of the Project Implementing Unit (PIU) enhanced to implement Public Sector and Decentralization Capacity Building Programme Support Project (PSCAP)
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Public Sector, Decentralizatio

title: Public Service, Decentralization and Capacity Building
